text: Jack Hogan (born Richard Roland Benson, Jr.; November 25, 1929 â€“ December 6, 2023) is an American actor. He is most notable for the role of PFC William G. Kirby on the 1960s TV show Combat!. Jack Hogan died at his home in Bainbridge Island, Washington, on December 6, 2023, at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from North Carolina
title: Jack Hogan
